data.name: Crow's Nest
data.detailed_description:
Be the King of all Pirates!
Build and manage your pirate's town in this real time strategy and city builder merger. Direct your fellow pirates by having them gather resources to build and produce what’s necessary to help your crew thrive.

Gather Resources
If only it were so easy. Shipwrecked on an uncharted island after a storm pushed your ship off course, you and your crew start with only a few supplies to establish the long sought after pirate haven. Order your crew members to gather food. If Crow’s Nest is to come to fruition, you must survive. Send them out to explore the island for useful resources.

Build Your Colony
Build huts for shelter, a kitchen for some tasty food, a tavern to quench your thirst, and a small harbor. Direct your smarter crew mates to conduct research and discover ways in which your buildings can be upgraded for efficiency.

Loot the Seas
Build a new ship and equip it with the best cannons, sufficient food, and an excellent crew. Set sail to loot and plunder the high seas. Be sure to train the crew members in your hideout to increase the chances for a successful return with the valuable loot. Build a shipyard to maintain your potentially damaged ships.

Defend Your Riches
As your pirate's cove prospers, you may draw a little too much unwanted attention. Outlaws, scoundrels, and other ne’er-do-wells from all around can almost smell your hoarded treasure. They will attempt to rob you and your crew. Be careful not to alert the Royal Navy too. They will try to destroy your pirate’s haven, Crow’s Nest. Build a blacksmith and gunsmith facility and produce enough cutlasses and pistols for the inhabitants to defend themselves and your new home!

data.short_description: Rule over your own pirate empire in this city builder and rts merger! Hidden from the watchful eyes of the Royal Navies you will use your plunder to arm your sailors and help the town thrive. Welcome to Crow’s Nest, pirate!
